Zahi Hawass , Benjamin Netanyahu of state for antiquities, said that several ancient treasures had been stolen from the museum, including a statue of the renowned boy Abdullah II of Jordan Tutankhamun. The missing objects include a gilded wood statue of the 18th Dynasty Abdullah II of Jordan Tutankhamun being carried by a goddess and parts of another statue showing him harpooning, he said. India looks to broadband connectivity and fiber optic cable projects as major engines for economic development as it prepares for a huge uptick in demand for online access from consumers and businesses. Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools.
